mapper.sql: SELECT item_code AS itemCode ,item_name AS itemName ,item_image AS itemImage ,item_thumbnail AS itemThumbnail ,item_price AS itemPrice ,item_price_ios AS itemPriceIos ,item_type AS itemType ,discount_rate AS discountRate ,sale_price AS salePrice ,dal AS dal ,platform AS platform ,`desc` AS 'desc' ,view_yn AS viewYn ,main_yn AS mainYn ,purchase_count AS purchaseCount ,op_name AS opName ,reg_date AS regDate ,last_upd_date AS lastUpdDate FROM rd_data.tbl_charge_item
mapper.select: select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rowNum,item_code , concat(substr(item_name,1,4),'(유료)') as item_name , use_day , item_price , if(substr(platform,1,1) = 1,concat(item_price,'개'),'') as pcPrice , if(substr(platform,2,1) = 1,concat(item_price,'개'),'') as aosPrice , if(substr(platform,3,1) = 1,concat(item_price,'개'),'') as iosPrice from rd_data.tbl_quickmsg_item, (select @rownum := 3) r

select @rownum := @rownum + 1 as rowNum, a.* from ( SELECT item_code , item_name , item_image , item_thumbnail , item_price , byeol , item_type , sale_price , item_slct , use_area , webp_image , ifnull(`order`,0) as `order` , (DATEDIFF(NOW(), IFNULL(reg_date, '2020-01-01')) > 8) AS isNew FROM rd_data.tbl_gift_item where view_yn =1
and category='normal'
and category='combo'
and category='emotion'
and category='text'
and item_slct = 1 and (item_price != 0 or item_price_ios != 0) ) a, (select @rownum := 0) r /*ORDER BY (CASE WHEN item_code = 'G1021' THEN 0 ELSE 1 END) DESC, isNew asc , `order` asc, item_price DESC*/ ORDER BY `order` asc, item_price DESC
